creator.description:
Subscribe, Like & Comment up to *3* labels you'd like.

Please only report: Garbage/Carbrain/NIMBY/Gadgetbahn/Scared of Cities. The other labels are for fun!

Urbanism+ Feed: @urbanism.plus

locales.description:
This user has been flagged for fear-mongering and/or spreading misinformation about the safety of cities.
Automobiles kill 40k+ people in the US alone.
Dense walkable cities are safer and misinformation is dangerous to the safe-street movement.
locales.name: Scared of Cities

locales.description: This account promotes transportation systems or technologies that are marketed as futuristic or high-tech but are often impractical, unproven, or overly complex for mass use. Think Hyperloop.
locales.name: Gadgetbahn

locales.description: admin or mod of U+
locales.name: U+ Staff

locales.description: This post has been flagged for NIMBYism
locales.name: NIMBYism

locales.description: This post has been flagged as carbrain or anti-cyclist. Cars kill. Waling and cycling provides organic exercise, reduces financial burden, can improve mental health, and reduces carbon footprints. The future of our planet and reduction of deaths caused by motorists requires us to cure carbrain.
locales.name: Carbrain Comment

locales.description: This post has been flagged for fear-mongering and misinformation of the dangers of cities. Studies reveal life expectancy is higher in cities vs rural/suburbs. Walkable dense cities save lives.
locales.name: Cities Scary

locales.description: Gadgetbahn content
locales.name: Gadgetbahn
